title: B.S. Report - The Grantland Basketball Hour (Ep. 6)
description: Kobe Bryant joins Bill Simmons and Jalen Rose to reflect on his career with Shaq, his legacy as a Laker, and the new Showtime documentary 'Kobe Bryant's Muse.'
